# AI Usage Disclosure

This project was produced with assistance from **ChatGPT (OpenAI)**.

## Sections I Built Myself (Direct Manual Work)
- Core UI layout and form structure in `public/index.html`.
- Visual styling/theme decisions in `public/styles.css`.
- Small UI interaction polish (labels, spacing, value display, preset wording) in `public/app.js`.
- Final review and organization of project files.

## Sections Assisted/Generated by ChatGPT (OpenAI)
- Backend/API architecture and implementation in `server/server.js`:
  - Express route design
  - Input validation
  - Hugging Face Router chat integration
  - Error handling patterns
- Prompt-wrapper logic and role-separation implementation in `public/app.js`:
  - System prompt construction
  - Developer rules integration
  - Request payload shaping
- Technical documentation drafts and structured write-ups:
  - `README.md`
  - `REFLECTION.md`
  - `AI_DISCLOSURE.md`
- Commit message drafting pattern and milestone breakdown.

## Final Responsibility
- I reviewed and accepted all content before submission.
- I remain responsible for correctness, assignment compliance, and final presentation.
